item.title: Run Rstudio server in a SLURM allocated node
item.description: Rstudio server slurm I have been spoiled at my current workplace. We have Rstudio server running on our shared servers with access to lots of CPUs and enough memory to say the least, but I may not always find myself in this situation. When I was first learning R I was running Rstudio locally, but I wasn’t working with massive genomic datasets then, and required fewer CPUs and much less memory.
